addLiquidity.title: Add liquidity
addLiquidity.priceFormMessage: We could not fetch the current price for the pair. Please set the prices manually.
addLiquidity.liquidityShapeDescription: Liquidity shape allows you to place your liquidity into several bins and aggregate liquidity with other liquidity providers. Precision {precision}.

descriptions.focused: Focused liquidity shape takes current price and adds the most liquidity to the current bin price. It adds little less liquidity to the surrounding bins, and adds minimum liquidity to the min and max price.
descriptions.spread: Spread liquidity shape takes current price and adds the small liquidity to the current bin price. It adds little more liquidity to the surrounding bins, and adds maximum liquidity to the min and max price.
descriptions.equal: Equal liquidity shape adds the same liquidity to all bins from min to max price.
descriptions.single: Single bin does not use the bin tick system but uses the single liquidity pool with defined minimum price and maximum price.
descriptions.wall: Wall order allows you to define the single price and when current price is below, others can buy at the price level, and if the current price is above the fixed price others will sell at the price level. This order type allows you to make a liquidity wall, and you will earn money whenever the price is volatile over this price level.

addLiquidity.singlePortionUnavailable: Connect a wallet with both pool assets and select an existing single-bin range to enable the slider.

errors.singleRatioTooSmall: Deposit amounts are too small to match the existing pool ratio. Increase both amounts.

warnings.mayNeedOptIn: You have zero balance for {asset}. If you own this asset, your connected account may not be opted-in to it yet.

info.singleRatioAdjusted: Deposit amounts were adjusted to match the pool ratio.

success.poolCreated: no pools created | {count} new pool created | {count} new pools created

about.title: About Biatec DEX
about.intro: Self custody decentralized exchange built on AVM. We are working on <clamm>Concentrated liquidity AMM</clamm> protocol where a person can set liquidity in a specific price range.
about.ecosystem: We utilize not just our liquidity protocol, but each market order executes throughout the {environment} ecosystem using a DEX aggregator.
about.aggregator: At the moment the DEX aggregator used is <folks>Folks Router</folks>.
about.chart: At the moment the chart library used is <vestige>Vestige widget</vestige>.
about.grantText: This work has been performed with support from the Algorand Foundation xGov Grants Program <xgov>xGov#80</xgov>. <source>Source code</source>.
about.disclaimer1: Even though Biatec DEX trading is already working, the concentrated liquidity smart contract is still under development, and changes to the web may still occur. You are using beta software and are responsible for verifying every transaction you sign.
about.disclaimer2: SELF CUSTODY â€“ We do not hold your assets at any moment. You interact directly with smart contracts and are responsible for securing your Algorand accounts.
about.disclaimer3: We use ARC14 authorization to verify you are the holder of the account. You may use an ARC76 email-password Algorand account and will be asked to submit the password each time you make transactions. Most Algorand wallets can sign transactions.
about.disclaimer4: The highest security can be achieved by using a multisig account with a 2FA setup that includes multiple hardware devices (e.g., Ledgers).
about.disclaimer5: The lowest security, but fastest trading experience, can be achieved with a mnemonic.
about.assetsDescription: We plan to be a MiCA-compliant company, therefore we try to limit the use of scam coins, rug-pull tokens, pump-and-dump tokens, or tokens without any utility.
about.legalInfo: Website dex.biatec.io is run by Scholtz & Company, jsa. Trade registry ID: 51882272; Tax ID: 2120828105.
about.legalGroup: Biatec DEX is part of Biatec Group - <biatec>www.biatec.io</biatec>.

header.dex: Access trading, liquidity management, and general DEX information

dashboard.portfolioValue: Total value of all your assets in USD, including those in liquidity pools
dashboard.assetsCount: Number of different assets you have opted-in to on the Algorand blockchain
dashboard.largestHolding: Your most valuable asset holding by USD value
dashboard.assetSelection: Choose which asset to use as the base currency for trading
dashboard.refresh: Reload your account balances and positions from the blockchain

trading.assetSelector: Choose the asset you want to trade. This will be the base currency in the trading pair.
trading.currencySelector: Choose the quote currency. Prices will be shown as Asset/Currency (e.g., BTC/USD).
trading.latestPrice: The most recent trading price for this asset pair
trading.priceChart: Visual representation of price movements and trading volume over time
trading.volume: Total trading volume for this time period
trading.manageLiquidity: Add or remove liquidity for this trading pair

liquidity.shapeFocused: Places most liquidity around the current price with decreasing amounts further away
liquidity.shapeSpread: Distributes liquidity evenly across a wide price range
liquidity.shapeEqual: Places equal amounts of liquidity in every price bin
liquidity.shapeSingle: Creates a single concentrated position at one specific price point
liquidity.shapeWall: Creates a price wall - buy orders below the wall, sell orders above it
liquidity.lpFee: Trading fee you earn as a liquidity provider (0.01% to 10%)
liquidity.fee001: Very low fee - suitable for stable pairs with low volatility
liquidity.fee01: Low fee - good for most trading pairs
liquidity.fee02: Standard fee - balances earnings and attractiveness
liquidity.fee03: Medium fee - for pairs with moderate volatility
liquidity.fee1: High fee - for volatile or new trading pairs
liquidity.fee2: Very high fee - for highly speculative assets
liquidity.fee10: Maximum fee - only for extremely volatile assets
liquidity.depositAmount: Amount of this asset you want to add to the liquidity pool
liquidity.maxButton: Use your full available balance for this deposit
liquidity.precision: Price precision affects how many price levels your liquidity covers
liquidity.priceRange: The price range where your liquidity will be active
liquidity.singlePortion: Percentage of your maximum possible deposit to use

wallet.connect: Connect your Algorand wallet to start trading and managing liquidity
wallet.disconnect: Disconnect your wallet and log out
wallet.address: Your Algorand account address - click to copy
wallet.optIn: Opt-in to new assets to make them available in your portfolio
wallet.balance: Your current balance of this asset in your wallet

tables.assetId: Unique identifier for this asset on the Algorand blockchain
tables.balance: Amount of this asset you currently own
tables.usdValue: Current value of your holdings evaluated in USD
tables.usdPrice: Current market price evaluated in USD
tables.poolValue: Value of your liquidity in this pool evaluated in USD
tables.poolCount: Number of liquidity pools this asset is part of
tables.assetTvl: Total Value Locked (TVL) in USD when this asset is the primary asset in pools
tables.otherAssetTvl: TVL in USD from paired assets in pools where this asset is secondary
tables.totalTvl: Combined TVL in USD from all pools involving this asset
tables.fees1d: Trading fees earned over the last 24 hours in USD
tables.fees7d: Trading fees earned over the last 7 days in USD
tables.swapAction: Trade this asset by swapping it with another asset
tables.addLiquidityAction: Add liquidity to earn trading fees for this asset pair
tables.removeLiquidityAction: Remove your liquidity position and claim accumulated fees
